text: svargavakasikal narakavakasikaleat viliccu parayum: nannaleat nannalute raksitav vagdanam ceytat nannal yathart'thyamayi kantettikkalinnu. ennal ninnalute raksitav (ninnaleatâ€Œ) vagdanam ceytat ninnal yathart'thyamayi kantettiyea? avar parayum: ate appeal oru vilambarakkaran avarkkitayil viliccuparayum: allahuvinre sapam akramikalute melakunnu
